description: Since his early days, handsome and super hung Thomas has always been an Active Duty favorite.  Thomas is a big ball of hot, ripped, toned and tight mansex wrapped up and ready to go. He's loud, expressive and doesn't leave one wanting for emotional feedback. Thomas gives us one hell of a performance in this scene which is actually his first solo ever. This is the kind of energy he gave the camera the very first night I met him. Imagine how excited I was at the possibilities to come. In this solo he assumes the role of a frat boy and really takes it to the edge.
title: Thomas, Scene #01
